comment.author: 27920980@N03
comment._content: Mennonites are really globetrotter! it's just amazing to find Mennonite in 1956 espically in Algeria. are they American or Canadian?

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content:
Could be either US American or Canadian.  These photographs document the work of the Mennonite Mission Board and Mennonite Central Committee -- both binational organizations with service workers from the US and Canada.  

You are right -- the Mennonites get around!
